Package client

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
client.GUIController
public class GUIController
extends java.lang.Object
The GUIController for the clients Registration App. Dictates functionality of model and GUI depending on user inputs.
Since:
April 19, 2020
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dylan Rae & Tyler Sawatzky
